## VenueğŸ¡
The school will take place at [Seminar House of the University of Bayreuth in Wallenfels](https://maps.app.goo.gl/AJsRbag7ddPvdwrz6), Germany. ## AccommodationğŸ›Œ
The participants will be accommodated in shared rooms at the Seminar House of the University of Bayreuth. The rooms are equipped with bunk beds, a desk, and a wardrobe. The bathrooms are shared. The participants are expected to bring their own towels and toiletries.

## TravelğŸš—
**The participants are expected to organize their travel**. However, the organisers may refund participants certain travel expenses. The participants are expected to arrive in the morning of the 23rd of September and leave in the afternoon on the 28th of September. **The organisers will organise a shuttle service Bayreuth**. The nearest train station is in Kronach, which is 20 km away, and the nearest airport is in Nuremberg. The is a possibility to park a car at the Seminar House. If you want to drive a car and want to share the ride with other participants, please let us know in advance.
